overview: Buffalo Bill Jr. (Dick Jones), his spitfire sister, Calamity (Nancy Gilbert), and their adoptive father, Judge "Fair 'N' Square" Wiley (Harry Cheshire), keep the Texas range varmint-free in this classic 1950s show, which showcases Jones's astounding trick riding. This collection includes six thrilling episodes including the premiere, in which Bill and Calamity must stop a pair of villains from kidnapping the great Apache warrior Geronimo.
title: TVGuide Westerns: Buffalo Bill, Jr.
